Extra Credit ;)

Sweatshirt Project

I was once in a store when I saw the perfect Sweatshirt - a light pink crewneck that simply said “Sweatshirt” on it. Or so I thought. Upon closer inspection, I noticed that this sweatshirt actually said “Sweetheart” on it. My shopping trip ruined, I was inspired to design the perfect sweatshirt myself. If I can get at least 30 people in the Chicago area to get behind this design and purchase one, my tragedy will come to an end and I shall live happily ever after!

Live order count:
